name.et: Tabox - Save and Share Tab Groups
name.fa: Save Tab Groups for Tab Session Manager
name.ja: オートタブセーバープロ

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Tabs to Notion with one click. Export Tabs to Notion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Tab Saver Pro is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help users easily manage and save their browsing tabs. 
Whether you need to stay efficient at work or quickly recover previous browsing sessions during leisure time, Auto Tab Saver Pro provides the perfect solution for you.

Why Choose Auto Tab Saver Pro?
1. Automatic Tab Saving: This extension automatically saves the URLs of your open tabs, ensuring you don't lose any important information.
2. One-Click Access: You can easily open all tabs from the past 7 days with just one click, saving you a lot of time and effort.
3. Daily Access: Select saved tabs from specific dates to quickly restore your browsing state at a particular time.
4. Data Management: Clear all saved data from the past week with just one click to keep your browser tidy.
5. Scheduled Saving: Set automatic save intervals (e.g., every 1, 5, or 10 minutes) to ensure your tabs are always up to date.
6. Local Storage: Your data is only stored in the browser's cache and is never uploaded to any servers, ensuring your privacy is secure.

Who Is It For?
Whether you are a student, a professional, or an average user, Auto Tab Saver Pro can help you manage your browsing tabs more efficiently, enhancing your work and study productivity. Install it now and experience seamless tab management!
